STATE v. GRAY No. COA06-754 Court of Appeals of North Carolina Filed May 1, 2007 Certification Date May 21, 2007 Appeal from New Hanover (04CRS67069, 04CRS67070, 04CRS67071, 04CRS67072, 04CRS67073, 04CRS67076, 04CRS67077, 04CRS67082, 04CRS67083, 04CRS67084, 04CRS67097, 05CRS15025).
